
# UNIX Code Converter

This pacakage converts UNIX_VALUE into a readable date
## Installation


```bash
npm i unix-timestamp-converter
```

## Usage

```python

const time = require('unix-timestamp-converter');

time.UNIX_CODE();

```

## Example
```
const time = require('unix-timestamp-converter');

const readableDate = time.UNIX_CODE(1509451524);

console.log(readableDate);
```
```
OUTPUT: 31 Oct 2017
```
